name: Shell Argina S2 30
description: Lubricant for modern and highly rated medium-speed trunk-piston diesel engine applications
category: Oli motore - Pistone del motore - Trunk

globalDocs.name: Shell Argina S2 30 EN TDG V1.9 23-Jun-2020

localDocs.name: Shell Argina S2 30 Italy EN 140007645406 EHS V1.5 25-AUG-2023
Shell Argina S2 30 Italy IT 140007645406 EHS V1.5 25-AUG-2023

marketing: Shell Argina S2 30 is a multifunctional crankcase lubricant for highly rated medium-speed diesel engines operating on residual, blended or distillate fuels. Shell Argina S2 30 has a BN of 20 and is designed for conditions of low oil stress.
